title: Ace De Luca
description: Aria White is known as the most skilled assassin in the underground world. Her father is known for being one of the top five most powerful illegal bosses.Ace De Luca on the other hand is a whole different game. He is ruthless, controlling, and almost as lethal as fire. He likes to play games with people before he breaks them into the palm of his hand.Both Ace and Aria cross paths unexpectedly but when a flame lits between them, will they both get burned?
author: Jaclin Marie
